title: Same skins in the Snowdown Shop and Lunar Revel Shop
body: When the Snowdown Shop was out, two of the skins I got were Blade Mistress Morgana and Dreadknight Nasus. In the Lunar Revel, I got the same skins (I did not purchase them previously). This is kind of frustrating, getting the same skin twice, so I'm wondering if this has happened to anyone else and if Riot can give an explanation on why and if they can do anything about it. Thanks for reading.
